articles.content: Investing.com-- Asian stock markets rose on Tuesday, tracking overnight gains on Wall Street as investors positioned for a heavy week of U.S. megacap technology earnings, while South Korean shares ju… [+2290 chars]

articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: Alliance with US would 'collapse' if Japan fled a Taiwan crisis: Takaichi - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Japanese PM refers to possibility of joint operation to evacuate citizens
articles.content: TOKYO -- Failing to respond if American forces came under attack in a Taiwan crisis would threaten Japan's critical security alliance with the U.S., Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi said Monday.
